website_summaries.verdict: A silk product that can help guard against the formation of wrinkles and skin creases. Protects hair overnight, too.
pros: very gentle on the facial skin as you sleep
Helps shield hair from split ends and other damage that can be sustained at night
cons: Some buyers have complained about receiving the wrong size

customer_reviews.title: After the burning test, I think it is real silk.
customer_reviews.text: I did a burning test to see if it was real silk. There was a small piece of fabric included in the package. I burnt it. It had no flame. It had ashes. It smelled terrible, like burnt meat. I think it is real silk. I added the video to the review.
customer_reviews.author: cr

customer_reviews.title: I have fine thin hair
customer_reviews.text: I have fine thin hair; and with this silk pillow case my hair does not get all tangled and frizzy. I bought this to try one more thing to help prevent losing so much hair. It is great.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Moran

customer_reviews.title: Yes Girl, Get It!!!
customer_reviews.text: 100% silk front and back. Zip closure that slides like butter. Very important to have a zip closure or else it will slide right off your pillow. Slept on it for a couple days and my hair looks amazing already. I have thick long hair and get knots easily, no freaking knots....none. No face creases either. I have sensitive skin and my skin feels alot calmer as well. If you want silky hair, no face creases and if you have sensitive skin, get it.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: NOT SILK
customer_reviews.text: This pillowcase is described to be 100% silk, BUT IT IS NOT SILK!! It is a synthetic material. I do not appreciate being lied to, and I am returning this asap for a refund. I honestly don't understand all of the positive reviews here. If you want real silk, keep looking elsewhere because this is not it!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Early

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointing pillow case
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews for days, I decided to try Yanibest. Needless to say, I’m extremely disappointed! My packaging only came with this one page, two sided paper. Nothing in my case says it is Oeko-Tex. Couldn’t believe how rough it was and the inside was even worse! I followed the directions of washing word by word and did exactly what they said, nothing! Yes I did the burn test on the sample and that was silk, BUT the actual case was NOT silk! I’ll take my loss, but I certainly don’t want anyone else to lose. Don’t waste your money or allow it to ruin your mood like it did mine. 🤦🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Amy Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this pillowcase.
customer_reviews.text: I received my pillowcase today. I carefully hand washed with cold water. I did not wring it. I wrapped in a towel and rolled to absorb excess water and dried flat. When I picked it up after it dried it was torn along the seam. I am very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: lorraine gilberg

customer_reviews.title: Love my beautiful pillowcase
customer_reviews.text: I read it somewhere to use silk/satin pillowcase to prevent wrinkles on your face or pulling your hair out. I can't tell you about the wrinkles (haha) but I can definitely tell that it helps for hair. I usually find 10-15 strands in the morning but now I have between 0-3. Yeay~ It feels good and I washed it in the nest, delicate cycle in the cold water then line dry. I already washed a few times and it is fine. I only order one to test drive and will buy some more. They are beautiful and comfortable~~
customer_reviews.author: Cielbleu

customer_reviews.title: Silk looks ok.  Can't tell much difference between this 19 Mum vs 21 Mum.  Zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: Dye falling out on the first wash. Zipper loose and felt off on first day. Tried very hard to put it back so I cancelled the return. Not as refined as the ZiXXX brand 25 Mum pillow shams. The JMXX brand 21 Mum was slightly better in stitching. Packaging is very cheap compared to the other two brands I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Audi Quattro

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Not real silk. One wash and case is ruined.
customer_reviews.text: Not real silk. One wash and case is ruined. Do not purchase this. Waste of money and a scam!
customer_reviews.author: icey

customer_reviews.title: No difference for hair and face
customer_reviews.text: This product is more trouble than its worth. It has made no difference in the moisture levels and health of my hair and face
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Reviews were misleading
customer_reviews.text: This pillowcase was soft and I used it for about a month (washing twice as instructed). If anything, the acne I suffer from got worse from this pillowcase even though I got it because reviews said it helped with acne. Just goes to show that you can’t believe reviews on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one, you wont be sorry
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST pillowcase I have ever purchased. I had another pillowcase (supposed to be silk), but it turned out to be a satin charmeuse, possible polyester? YUCK. I hated it! I was always hot and sweaty. Plus it was the envelope style, which the pillow kept coming out of the case. THIS pillowcase stays cool, and I have not gotten hot or sweaty once! My opinion is DEFINITELY get one with a zipper. I LOVE that this case has a zipper. Obviously my pillow has not come out once! Buy this, you will not regret it for a second!
customer_reviews.author: catchickenlady

customer_reviews.title: Dubious “Silk”
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to help protect my hair from tangling and breakage. I don’t believe it is real silk because I woke up with the worst bedhead I’ve ever had. I did not use right away and have missed my return window. Super bummed: total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product/Great for Sensitive Skin+ACNE
customer_reviews.text: If you want to wake up to perfect hair and skin then this pillowcase is for you! I have always dabbled with the idea of purchasing a beauty pillow but never saw it as a priority. Now, I’m convinced! I’ve had the best sleep since receiving my yanibest silk pillowcase. I was pleasantly shocked that the king size actually fit my extra large pillows from Bed Bath and Beyond. Which is great because now, waking up refreshed is no longer an issue! My skin is glowing, gorgeous, and acne free! Thanks, Yanibest!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Truan

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to order and receive this product. Unfortunately, after the first night my neck and ear and scalp around the back of my head developed very red and itchy hives from some kind of allergic reaction. I decided to return all 3 cases that I ordered without risking anymore for the intended use for my child also. Never had any action to silk product or bedding/pillow before.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Hardly better than the cheap microfiber "satin"
customer_reviews.text: I have satin silk blouses that are very nice and soft. But this pillowcase does not even come close. It's much more like the cheap microfiber satin sheets being sold these days. I have smooth hands, but if they're the least bit dry, the snag on this pillowcase. It's maddening. This was a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke first use.
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke the first use. It kept getting stuck when I was trying to unzip it to put it on my pillow, then the whole thing came apart. Actually was considering buying one as a gift before this but will find another company. This one will be returned. Not happy with this purchase at all. Considering the price, the zipper should not have broken with the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: King was too small for a king pillow
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a king, but it was too small for a king pillow case and I should have immediately returned it. It bent the pillow. Then I washed it in Cold water and it shrunk, so it is not usable .
customer_reviews.author: writing momma

customer_reviews.title: Tried, Tested and true 100% silk
customer_reviews.text: Only giving this a 4 star because I'm not sure how durable they are yet. But I won't to dispell all these people saying it's not silk. It absolutely IS. I even performed the burn test on threads I was able to obtain from the edges. It smelled like hair burning, flame stopped when fire source was removed and when touched the burned part turned to powder. . This is 100% silk
customer_reviews.author: The Tonk's

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING
customer_reviews.text: This product is NOT 100% silk! I have owned silk pillowcases in the past and know what silk feels like. When I wake up in the morning my hair is a frizzy mess and silk just doesn’t do that to hair. I was skeptical at first when I saw the price but also this product is literally advertised as 100% so I thought I’d try them out, BIG mistake. Even after the first wash I went to put them on my pillows and the zipper started to pull at threads. This pillowcase is cheap and a scam don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan lewis

customer_reviews.title: Quality at reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a previous silk pillowcase from another retailer and was disappointed. I looked on Amazon hoping to find a reasonable price and good quality. I am more than happy with this purchase. The material, zipper, and seams are high quality and have held up through several washings. I tend to air dry the pillowcase after washing. The silk is soft, like satin! A lovely customer appreciation note was included with the item and it was packaged in an aestheticly pleasing wrapping.
customer_reviews.author: L. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Good for your hair!
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions for cleaning! I'm African -American...I got tired of my cotton pillowcases being stained with oil from my hair (you know what I'm talking about ladies)... So I slipped this bad bow on in Navy blue. Super soft. Still shows oil... To be honest, but you can't tell if you get a dark color... So be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Carswell

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for price
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased the expensive silk pillowcase that is out there, and I am in love with it!! I bought this one thinking it was great to have lower price for basically same product. I am sorry to say there is a huge difference. I may have liked it if I had not had the other one first. No comparison. Just an honest FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: Don't get white color bc sweat stains
customer_reviews.text: The cheetah print pillow case served me well for 4 years. I just got this white version and the first morning there appeared a huge stain! It's from my sweat of course but I never thought it would be this bad. Get any other color than white!
customer_reviews.author: Brent E. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Best pillowcase I have ever owned. Be nice to this pillow and It'll be nice to you.
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillowcase. It actually does such a good job of rubbing up against my face at night it has reduced my acne on my right cheek embarrassingly well. It makes my hair look so much better because it doesn't tangle as much. It feels sleek and looks absolutely fabulous. Be careful cleaning it though, it can leech dye if left in water for too long. When you wash it you want to be through, quick, and let it air-dry. I'm buying a second one because winter will make air-drying take longer. Even if the maintenance is a little tougher than usual I think it's worth all it's benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware 50/50
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, each a different color - one came as expected great quality and the other came with a sticky substance line throughout the whole length of pillow. Would not come off during washing as instructed and required scrubbing witch resulted in ruined appearance and quality. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Wow love this pillowcase
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the perfect silky pillowcase for my new MY PILLOW pillow. I have been sleeping better and my hair seems to look better in the morning. It washed and dried with no wrinkles. All the other silky cases I ordered were totally wrinkled. Would love if it was a little darker Aqua but it works. This is the second one I ordered because I also love the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Goldie Oldie

customer_reviews.title: Defective Zipper
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this pillow case. I ordered the taupe color. It's so beautiful and soft and fits on my queen pillowcase perfectly, BUT....I immediately put it on my pillow before washing it to see if it fits and now it's stuck due to an defective zipper. My husband tried to get it off but he's scared he's gonna brake it. I'm going to keep it on for now. But if it brakes when it's time to wash it I hope I am able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Fisher

customer_reviews.title: No sweat, best thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have really fine hair and I get really hot at night which leads to my hair getting sweaty and the cotton pillow case's getting damp which in turn causes my hair to drag on the pillow case, snag and break. With this silk pillow case my neck and head no longer gets sweaty. My hair really glides across the pillow. If you hair fine hair, this pillow case is a MUST. Fairly priced as well. I picked up the black one just so I don't have to worry about staining it.
customer_reviews.author: John Willis

customer_reviews.title: Such a good value!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a silk pillowcase for a long time but have always been put off by the price. This one fit perfectly in my budget and it was totally worth it! It's a pretty big pillowcase and fit my memory foam pillow nicely. I noticed an immediate difference in my hair, much less frizzy in the morning with this pillowcase! I've also heard they're supposed to be good for your skin, but I can't say I've noticed much of a difference.
customer_reviews.author: B.Parker

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely junk- nothing special at all!
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows they are wrinkled but after washing they were fine. I will say these pillow cases absolutely don't do anything special for your face or hair if anything my face actually broke out with zits daily and my hair actually looks worse then when my husband and I just had cotton pillow cases that were perfect and surprisingly more comfortable than these. I was hoping they'd help in some way but did absolutely nothing like they say they are supposed to. My husband's neck also broke out with zits as he sleeps on his back so I know it isn't just me. Very disappointed and don't recommend at all!
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke after the first hand washing!
customer_reviews.text: I like the product though I've had better but what is really irritating to me that the very first time I hand washed the pillow case, the zipper broke! The pull completely came off and now it is almost impossible to zip up. The material along side the zipper keeps getting caught in the zipper making it extremely hard to zip! The very first time!!! I won’t buy from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: catmitch

customer_reviews.title: Purchased four months ago and it has completely come apart at the seams
customer_reviews.text: I followed washing instructions but the seams are cut so narrow they have completely unraveled through normal use and cleaning. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robin M

customer_reviews.title: Fake Silk, Failed Tests
customer_reviews.text: Did a couple of tests and it failed. I used a large formal napkin ring, since it was larger then a scarf, and it bunched up evertime, regardlese of the angle et cetera. Should not have. Stiff, folds neatly and easily and the sheen is white all over. That is all a sign of synthetic fake silk. It appears to be satin, not silk. The small piece they mail for the burn test is not the same material as the pillowcase. Seemed low for the price, but competition on amazon can be challenging. Still don't be fooled. China as always can say one thing, print fake documents and call it silk, but silk this is not.
customer_reviews.author: Acacia B Horsley

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow case
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow case. I bought this pillow case because of all the hype on silk pillow case are good for the hair and skin. I have had it for a month and notice the difference in my hair. No more frizzy or bed head when I get up. I will be purchasing another one. Do only come in as single pillow case.
customer_reviews.author: trouble*2

customer_reviews.title: Translucent
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a pair of cases, but only one per package. the material is translucent, so you may need something between the pillow and case. I'm pretty neutral about them. I do plan to use it all the time, and wash weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Winters

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend silk pillowcases
customer_reviews.text: I've used cotton, polyester, bamboo and now silk pillowcases and silk is not the best. Silk seems to keep the moisture from my drool or perspiration because during the night I can feel moisture throughout and it's not conducive to a good night's sleep. So I don't recommend you buy silk pillowcases. If I had to rate the best pillowcase I would have to say the bamboo pillowcase is both hygienic and comfortable and is the best out of all the above mentioned pillowcases. Oh yeah, it's also hand wash only and line dry.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Wong

customer_reviews.title: Came with a weird smell. Nice pillow case
customer_reviews.text: This had a funny smell to it when it first arrived so I washed it (as I would have anyway) and I laid it flat to dry. It still had a weird chemical/warehouse smell to it even after being washed. I use it anyway and noticed that smell has seemed to go away over time. Nice enough pillowcase otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Shannie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: Not even close to the quality of the Slip Silk pillowcase or even real silk. This also gave me a horrible breakout and I normally have very clear skin. If you need something cheap that looks decent this will work, but for skin/hair prevention don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Akoboe

customer_reviews.title: Get mulberry silk ones
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely not as soft as the mulberry silk ones from same vendor. Big difference. I will buy the others again even though they were more expensive. The zipper is one of the best feature.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality- fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Zipper came apart from case, less than 10 washes in. Cheap. Don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey T.

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and silky
customer_reviews.text: These pillow cases are indeed very soft. I have skin issues and this fabric was not real comfortable for me. This is not a one size fits all product. This may very well be great for someone else, just not for me. That being said, I did not send it back because my sister has the same one and she adores it, so I have it to her.
customer_reviews.author: mnloonatic

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL color blue and keep my long hair from tangling while I sleep
customer_reviews.text: My Grandma would use a satin pillow cover to keep her hair protected between salon visits while she slept. Had no idea how much I'd love this pillow case. It has a zipper closure and fits my king pillow easily. Washes up nicely. I put it in a laundry bag to protect it. I love it so much I purchased 2. Huge difference in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: catfvr

customer_reviews.title: It feels great, it's real silk, and it's 2" too short
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this but it does not fit a standard pillow. It's 24", not 26", and if you stuff a foam pillow into it the pillow will bunch up. It would be fine for a down pillow but not for a foam pillow. I'm disappointed. The silk is nice (and yes, it's real) and it does help with bed-head but I'm not willing to chop off the end of my pillow so I have to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Sandal

customer_reviews.title: NOT SILK (IVORY COLOR)
customer_reviews.text: The ivory color is most definitely not silk. It feels like a cheap satin at best. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: teresa custin guis

customer_reviews.title: Will be returning
customer_reviews.text: Bought two after reading reviews. If one is expecting silk to put against ones face then one expects soft silk not rough material that feels like polyester. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: The Mrs.

customer_reviews.title: Love it great for dry hair and acne issues.
customer_reviews.text: Love the cases. So soft my face does not breakout with material and my hair does not pull. My hair is not dried out also. Cotton soaks up your oils and if you have dry hair as I do then cotton is not what you want to lay your head on. So I purchased three more. These come only singles, so if you want a pair besure to purchase quanity 2. I thought they came as a pair cause I did not comprehend the reading. I would make this purchase again because I have and plan on buying more.
customer_reviews.author: .Cuban_tattooist

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color I purchased, very rich looking. I have heard that silk pillowcases will stop some of the facial wrinkling for those like myself who cannot stop sleeping on my side (I hope this is true!). Not to excited about hand washing but I feel it is worth the extra effort. The queen size I purchased is the perfect size for my pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn K

customer_reviews.title: My curls love these silk pillowcases
customer_reviews.text: I have very curly hair and based on reviews from fellow curly heads, I decided to switch to silk pillowcase to see if it would keep my curls from frizzing in my sleep. I have to admit that I’ve noticed a considerable difference since switching. I would have to wet my hair and add more products before due to frizz in the mornings. Now, I just give my curls a good shake and I’m good to go. I typically go roughly 3 days between washing and this soft smooth silk pillowcase helps maintain my curls and keep them frizz free. I’m also noticing less breakage. Not to mention, the silk feel nice and soft again my skin! Love!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not silk
customer_reviews.text: I do not think this is silk. I believe it is polyester. Looks nice, feels nice, but for those of us allergic to polyester, beware. I knew it wasn’t silk the first time I washed it. Silk doesn’t machine wash well. This washes perfectly. So.. no polyester allergy? This is your pillowcase.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Routh

customer_reviews.text: First impression it staines really really easy i put it against my clean face to see the feel because i was so excited, i only used moisturizer couple hourse ago and it stained.. i washed it and wont go out the stain...so thats a bummer because i didn't even got a chance to actually put it on the pillow and already im a little disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Bergen anca ioana

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of money for me and I didn't think the product was high quality at all. My hair looked freakish when I would wake up. I don't like it and I'm not going to use it. Can't believe that I wasted my money on it...
customer_reviews.author: Lovie Lanz

customer_reviews.title: Best. Pillowcase. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I feel compelled to initiate this review for all y'all folks out there who may be on the fence when it comes to this pillowcase. This effing pillowcase is so obscenely soft and buttery that it literally woke me up 3 times last night (briefly) with its sensual caress...I came out of my fog and reveled in how amazing it felt on my face and arms (was clutching my pillow like the last box of girl scout cookies in the free world) and then gently drifted off again to sleep... Don't debate, life is too short to sleep on satin or cotton like a peasant.
customer_reviews.author: Lori M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The material is nice and it feels good to sleep on but it makes no difference to my hair or skin. I feel rather like my hair is worse from it. I bought two, which is good because you have to wash by hand and it takes a while to dry unless you really wring the water out, which would make it very wrinkled. I don't mind doing the hand washing if it is helpful to my skin and hair but since it isn't, I reverted to machine washable cases.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping hair smooth
customer_reviews.text: This pillowcase does a great job at keeping my fine straight hair from getting "bent" while I sleep. The smoothness of the "silk" is as they say "as smooth as silk". I have washed this pillow case in the washing machine and put it in the dryer. It does come out somewhat wrinkled, but can easily be touched up with a light iron. It does retain its smoothness and also feels cool to the touch so it feels refreshing to lay your face on this pillowcase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D'Amore

customer_reviews.title: This is just like those pants from the 80’s
customer_reviews.text: I’m laying on this pillow right now so can I even judge? Who am I? The pillow queen? To answer that yes. But let’s dive deeper into the scientifics because this isn’t silk. I’m not a silkworm so idk what’s real and what’s not but my soul knows this isn’t silk.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny Lord

customer_reviews.title: Silk texture ruined after a few washes
customer_reviews.text: I heard the benefits associated with a silk pillowcase and this particular one came recommended by an instagram influencer.. I love it so much I bought one for my boyfriend as well. We have seen improvements with our skin! Less breakouts for sure. Also I’ve seen improvements with my hair (less breakage). Only complaint I have is that after a few washes, the silk texture has been completely ruined on one of the cases. Will have to re purchase?
customer_reviews.author: samantha carson

customer_reviews.title: IT'S A PILLOWCASE!
customer_reviews.text: it's too late to return this pillowcase but I regret spending $20.00 for this product. It comes with a list of instructions of how to wash the pillowcase. IT IS A PILLOWCASE!! I would not purchase this again. I feel that all the "special care and wash instructions" should have been included with the item description.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: So far, I've been using this for a few days and I'm very happy with it. The color is as advertised and it fit my standard size pillow perfectly with a little extra room. I believe it will help with keeping my hair and skin healthier! Since I've only had it for a few days I'm not sure how it would hold up in the wash just yet. I will be following the directions to hand wash, and will most likely be ordering 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and Thin!
customer_reviews.text: Compared this advertised 21 momme silk to another brand’s 19 momme and was disappointed. The 19 momme is more luxurious and thicker. Also, colors were not as vibrant as appear in the photos!
customer_reviews.author: hmsfrost

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Just got my pillowcase and I ordered a queen however my case doesnt fit ANY of my pillows!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for oily skin/hair, prone to breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin and hair, even though I've always used soft all-cotton (sometimes flannel) sheets. Ever since I started using this silk pillowslip, my hair and skin have gotten less oily. (Also, I should mention that my aesthetician recommended a silk pillowslip for this very reason.) Yes, I handwash. If I remember to do that in the a.m., it's dry by t he time I want to nap after work. Downside of this model: the zipper-pull is a metal piece about 3/4 an inch long, and it has scratched the wood on my headboard a few times.
customer_reviews.author: A B

customer_reviews.title: Love This!
customer_reviews.text: I admit, I was a skeptic on whether I would like this or even if it would make a difference in my hair or skin but I have to say, it really does! My hair is less unruly in the morning and I have actually noticed that my skin feels nicer, no pillow marks/creases and I love how soft and luxurious it feels! I'm tempted to buy another one just because. Do not regret buying this at all.
customer_reviews.author: kindlemom1 (My Guilty Obsession Blog)

customer_reviews.title: Best silk pillowcase
customer_reviews.text: I keep buying these for my household- one bed at a time! We are in love! My daughter has super curly hair so regular pillow cases just cannot be used as they tangle her hair while she sleeps. For me I needed something that would not pull moisture from my hair all night (which cotton does). This silk has been transformative for us, and makes our hair and skin softer in the morning. I will never go back to any other fabric!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Burrell

customer_reviews.title: does not feel like silk
customer_reviews.text: This case does not feel like silk and my hair still looks like bed head when I get up in the morning. The other case I ordered from a different company is wonderful. The color of this case is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: hitchingpostfarm

customer_reviews.title: Hate the zipper!
customer_reviews.text: I am not satisfied with the craftsmanship of this pillowcase... low quality zipper, crooked seams. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Norma P

customer_reviews.title: I would trust this brand
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. I bought 10 silk pillowcases in different brands and colors and these were some of the softest- also included an authenticity test in the package! Beautiful soft silk- you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Last Long
customer_reviews.text: When I received this pillowcase I really liked using it. the fabric is decent and I have fine hair and it seemed to help my hair stay in place and not get all messed up. It also helped with wrinkles on my face since my hair and face glide over the pillowcase. That being said; the zipper fell apart after a few washes (by hand and in cold water; line dry). I have used baby pins to hold this together but unfortunately this is no longer working. The next time I purchase a silk pillowcase it will be one that has a button closure or a flap closure.
customer_reviews.author: Kathe

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for...
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions to handwash before use. I towel dried and let hang to dry as well. It is soft. However it is not comfortable at all. Your head literally slides off of it all night. Very disappointed in this purchase 😒.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Sutterfield

customer_reviews.title: Silk to keep your curls from frizzing
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a silk pillowcase because I have curly hair and it's smoother causing less curl break-down overnight. The color is awesome and these in particular have zippers on the case, which is great for keeping them on the pillow, since the silk is so smooth. Didn't bleed when I hand-washed it, either. I would buy this again - for now, I have two.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B. Reineri

customer_reviews.title: I love these pillow cases
customer_reviews.text: These are great cases! I purchased because silk is supposedly more gentle on your hair. I have to say, these really did improve my hair situation! I don't get rats nest type tangles on the back of my head as much (thank you curly hair... >_<) thanks to this pillow case! I simply hand wash them in the sink and hang to dry, and being silk they dry very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: echo.lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and pleasant to sleep on!
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought two pillowcases for much lower price that were described as "satin" - I had no idea that was not the same thing as silk! Those were pretty unpleasant to touch and very slippery. When I found put silk was the real thing that everyone says is so good for face and hair I decided to give it another shot and I am pleasantly surprised. It feels still different then cotton, but very nice to sleep on and not this fake slippery feeling. Also the light gray color is very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Clover5

customer_reviews.title: Silk feeling goes away!
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this and it was amazing until I washed it. It no longer has the slick feeling to it, it was like it literary washed out of the pillowcase.
customer_reviews.author: Beth H.

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about this pillowcase. I'll be ordering more colors. The quality is great, fits my pillow perfectly. I have curly hair, which is why I bought this and it does seem to cut down on frizz from tossing and turning. I normally sleep 'hot', and was wondering if this Silk would help that, the answer is Yes, it does not cause me any discomfort, and when I do turn, it's nice to get a nice, cool spot.
customer_reviews.author: Karo56

customer_reviews.title: Good pillowcase. recommended
customer_reviews.text: this pillowcase is soft and it is what i wanted. it has a zipper and it is tucked nicely into the side. you cannot tell its there when sleep. i washed in the washing machine when it came. no strings ir stitches came loose. i recommend. the only issue is the red color bleed onto my wall. i dont have a headboard so the pillowcase touches the wall and i noticed the wall is a little red.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Soft frizz free hair after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim because I’ve always wanted to try it. At first I wasn’t sure if I saw any difference but after a few weeks I do see a difference in my hair. When I wake up in the morning my hair is less frizzy and has no static. I used to wake up and sometimes my hair would have a ton of static to it and would frizz everywhere! It never has this anymore and look smoother in the morning. The only negative is that you have to hand wash it. Which I understand but is a small pain.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: My face loves sleeping on silk charmeuse!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting the difference sleeping on silk would make for my hair: no more tangles in the morning. I was concerned about laundering the pillowcase. I folded it, placed in in mesh bag and washed in the machine with cold water on gentle cycle. I left the case in the mesh bag and placed it in the dryer with the rest of my laundry, drying on the gentle cycle. It came out without a wrinkle. It was difficult to tell the difference from the unwashed pillowcase. I really love these pillowcases and intend to give them as gifts to my friends and family. BTW, silk charmeuse is really slippery, so I'm glad I got the zippered cases.
customer_reviews.author: maggiesmom

customer_reviews.title: Oh my oh my oh my...in such a good way!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillowcase. It is lovely, yes, but oh so smooth and ok, I’ll say it, exquisite on my face. I tend to be a back sleeper, but I start out on my side many times now just to get that silky sensation on my cheek. It's the right size just as described, the hidden zipper is sewed well into the seams. I’ve washed it several times now by hand and with gentle soap, hanging it up to dry, which it does quickly. It looks as good as new. It was a wonderful purchase. and the package is sooooo delicate, very nice for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: alvin ming

customer_reviews.title: Silk pillowcase convert
customer_reviews.text: I used to think it was a gimmick, but switching to silk pillowcases is so nice. My hair seems less tangled and I don't wake up with creases on my skin. I will say the pillowcase seemed too big for my pillow at first, but it shrunk in the dryer (happened by accident) and now it's perfect. It's easy to care for. I usually hang dry my pillowcase after a gentle wash and it's dry within 1-2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more wrinkly morning face! :)
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd silk pillow case. The 1st one I bought about 2yrs ago is still going strong, but I wanted to be able to have a second one while one is being washed. I wash mine in warm water and hang to dry out of the sun (no dryer, it wrecks the fibers!) I bought the grey color and it's a nice pewter grey. Love my silk pillows!
customer_reviews.author: carina

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I have about 5 of theses. I sleep on different pillows depending on my neck and I have 2 of theses for each one. They are great. Love that they zip so they don’t come off. The only wish I have is concerning wrinkles. I don’t put them in the dryer so they wrinkle quite a bit but it’s not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: LaShawnda

customer_reviews.title: Total bummer...
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this pillow case. I ordered it because my hair is thinning and breaking off on the side that I sleep on. The pillow case is not cooling and comfortable as described. It seems to hold heat which makes me toss and turn all night. I have only used it for a few days so I am unsure of the long term effects on my hair loss and breakage. I just wish it wasn't so uncomfortable to sleep on. I have grown accustomed to my crisp, cool cotton pillowcases. This just isn't the same:(
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: zipper broke after like second use. It's also pretty small, so if you have a fluffier pillow it barely fits, probably why the zipper broke. If you tend to sleep on less full pillows, then probably a good fit for you. It's soft and definitely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Pomes

customer_reviews.title: Oh What a Feeling!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a silk pillowcase to reduce wear on my hair. What I didn't expect was how pampered it would make me feel. I know, that sounds absurd, but it's true. I love it. I looked at lower-priced options but am glad I went with this one. It's a beautiful color and feels wonderful against my skin. When I consider the amount of enjoyment I'm getting from this pillowcase, the extra 15-20 dollars seems so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: It was supposed to be "champagne" but is more like orange.
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems okay but the color is quite lurid. It was supposed to be "champagne" but is more like orange.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader Santa Fe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Made more lines on my face then my normal pillow. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sayegh

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft, Fully Washable
customer_reviews.text: I use this pillowcase on a small pillow I keep under my mid-back at night. It's super soft and comfortable, and I've had no problems washing it with the rest of my sheets with no special treatment. I've probably washed it half a dozen times at least and see no signs of wear or damage from normal washing.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Steedman-Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Soft against your skin
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pillowcase since my hair was very staticky. Seems to have worked. My hair is smoother when I awake. I also thought it would feel cooler than my Egyptian cotton cases, but I don’t see a difference. I’ve washed in machine on gentle and hung to dry. No problems. Somewhat pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Helen A.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this pillowcase SO MUCH!!! It honestly brings me such joy every night and every morning rubbing my face against it. It's so soft and luxurious. I also got one for my best friend. Her boyfriend steals her pillow constantly now. GET IT!! Seriously, I want everything in my life made out of this. Also, I got the beige and black flower pattern and it looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Donquixote

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my pillowcase & love the fact it has a hidden zipper...it feels very comfortable, smooth and silky, my hair glides across it. Im ordering several more for my daughter & granddaughters because they have longer hair that tangles up with bedhead each morning. This will help ! Im ordering bright colors for them & appreciate a wide color variety. Now that i have one of these pillowcases, i don't want to sleep on any other kind !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke after a few months...
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this pillowcase, but after 3 months, the zipper broke. They don’t accept returns after 1 month. Can’t use the pillowcase anymore because the exposed zipper scratches my face.
customer_reviews.author: julie h

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Silk Pillowcase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help out with tangles and conditioning issues for my long hair. This has really made a big difference, as it seems to feel healthier, have less frizz, and help manage oils. I didn't think that it would be as comfortable to sleep on as it is! It feels very much like soft cotton. If I knew that this would have helped as much as it has, I would have gotten it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I washed it in cool water and hang dried it and it seems fine. It does keep my pillow cool. It is wrinkled as others have stated after washing but I am sure ironing it would be the solution. It fits my standard pillow but it is not a tight fit so it may fit a queen as well. My pillows are under cover so it doesn't matter. The only reason I took one star away is because I ordered the white and it is not true white like the picture but an off white.
customer_reviews.author: mbird

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I love this silk pillowcase. It is so soft. I have hand washed it and air dried it once and it came out great. I also love that it has a zipper because otherwise it is so soft it could slip off my pillow. Would definitely purchase again. My old cotton pillowcases feel rough in comparison
customer_reviews.author: Jtaylo

customer_reviews.title: ... a new pillow I got for Christmas and I love it so much that when I needed new bedding ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the jumbo gray for a new pillow I got for Christmas and I love it so much that when I needed new bedding is now all 100% silk. So, be forewarned you might become a silk bedding addict. This pillowcase is perfect. I love the zipper. The color is great. It is so soft, silky, smooth & comfortable. It feels cool when sleeping on it. I am now buying 2 more in black to match my new bedding. It's the best!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymouz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I have other silk pillow cases that are so much more comfortable than these. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Once you go silk, you can't go back.
customer_reviews.text: My first silk pillow case was 19 momme. I wil buying these from now on. You can feel the difference between the two grades of silk. This one is more smooth. It doesn't make you sweat. I live in a HOT climate. I hand was with gentle soap and rinse in water with vinegar.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G.

customer_reviews.title: Sooo good!
customer_reviews.text: After trying this silk pillowcase, I am a convert. I will only use silk pillowcases now. It feels so great on my face. I know it's better for my hair, too, and to keep wrinkles at bay! I now own two of these. I wash them in the sink with Woolite, and when I rinse them out, I will do a tiny bit of conditioner in there (the kind I use on my hair). They've stayed in great shape over the last 6 or so months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks dirty fast
customer_reviews.text: Edit March 2019: just wanted to update because the seller just called my personal cell phone from an unknown number and left me voicemail. Don't buy from this seller!! After sleeping on it several nights, I did not notice an improvement in my skin or hair. But the pillowcase did take on an oily appearance that won't go away even after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Repeat buy for our household
customer_reviews.text: we bought two silk pillowcase from this brand a year or so ago. They are are made of soft, thick silk, even in color. We use them regularly. The fabric does not show signs of age and the seams are in perfect condition. When we saw that they were on a lightning deal sale, we were very pleased and bought two more, to match our other set of sheet. Very happy with the product. It is as good as ever.
customer_reviews.author: Eloise Lemay

product_meta.title: YANIBEST Silk Pillowcase for Hair and Skin - 21 Momme 600 Thread Count 100% Mulberry Silk Bed Pillowcase with Hidden Zipper, 1 Pack Standard Size Pillow Case Grey
feature_bullets: Gorgeous silk pillowcase will help you have true beauty sleep; Yanibest luxuriously soft and stylish silk pillow cases are made from 21 momme pure charmeuse silk specifically chosen for its weight and feel; Pretty and classic colors are available for difference choice; Sleeping on silk does much more than making you feel like a Hollywood A lister, it has many health and beauty benefits, and is recommended by leading professionals.

Silk Pillowcase for Skin benefits: Do you wake up in the morning with sleep creases on your face? Silk contains 18 amino acids which nourish your skin while you sleep; Silk doesn’t absorb moisture from your face and body, preventing your skin from drying out;When you wake up after sleeping on a silk pillowcase, your face will be better hydrated and also beneficial to those with dry flaky skin; As a bonus, hydrated, plump skin cells show fewer fine lines and wrinkles than dehydrated skin cells;

Silk Pillowcase for Hair benefits:Do you wake up with crazy bed hair? Silk contains proteins that hair follicles need, creating a nourishing sleeping surface for all hair types; The luxurious fabric can help keep your hair soft, moisturised, and tangle free;Friction from sleeping on a cotton pillowcase can cause hair breakage and bed hair;Sleeping on a soft silk pillowcase hair will slide, which is much less damaging; Perfect for those who have wavy hair, silk helps prevent the frizz factor;

Silk Pillowcase Crafts Features and Care:Durable Exquisite craftmanship with neat stitches and invisible zipper design, hold your pillowcase perfectly; Silk performs best and wrinkles free when ironed damp in order to minimize the effects of the iron's heat;We recommend ironing right after a easy wash or creases heavily; Please follow the washing instructions on the washing label;

Silk Pillowcase Specifications and 1-Pack Package: Queen, Standard and King Size available for different choices; Queen size: 20"*30"(51cm*76cm); Standard size: 20"*26"(51cm*66cm); King Size: 20"*36"(51cm*91cm); Toddler Size: 14"*20"(36cm*51cm) ; 2-packs silk pillowcases also available for better value for money; Get this luxurious gift for yourself and your lovers, try it at home now or take it to enjoy your journey.
